m_szDocTitle: General Motors unites car-sharing services under new brand 'Maven' | Latest News & Updates at Daily News & Analysis
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- General Motors unites car-sharing services under new brand 'Maven' General Motors (Reuters) 2 Thu, 21 Jan 2016-11:34pm , Detroit , PTI The final destination is a mystery, but General Motors is taking another step on its fast-moving journey into new ways of getting around. The company on Thursday announced that it's formed a brand called "Maven" that will run its car-sharing ventures, including a new one that will begin competing with ZipCar next month in Ann Arbor, Michigan, and spread to other metro areas later this year.
